about_the_game:
Exit the Abyss is a psychological horror game set in an abandoned hospital. The player controls a young man who, after dying, finds himself in an alternate version of the hospital following the activation of a mysterious switch. To return to the realm of the living, he must complete 12 terrifying and mental trials. The game is built around psychological tension and an oppressive atmosphere, with the hospital’s dark, desolate environment amplifying the unease. The tasks are logical yet extraordinarily creative, each one presenting its own unique emotional and mental challenges.

Key Features: 

  • Psychological Horror Experience – The game offers a constant oppressive atmosphere while confronting the player with their own fears and subconscious anxieties.

  • Creative Puzzles – Each room presents a unique, minimal-interaction puzzle that has a profound emotional impact, each representing a mental trial.

  • Visually Striking and Minimalist Design – The game features a powerful visual style that prioritizes the player’s emotions and feelings, using minimalistic solutions.

  • Story and Atmosphere – There are no dialogues, human speech, or crying children. The story unfolds solely through clues and events within the game world.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.7GHz or similar
